Package fr.cnrs.iees.graph

Interface Tree<N extends TreeNode>

  • Type Parameters:
    N - The TreeNode subclass used to construct the tree
    All Superinterfaces:
    NodeSet<N>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleTree, TreeGraph
    public interface Tree<N extends TreeNode>
extends NodeSet<N>, fr.ens.biologie.generic.Textable

    The root interface for trees.

    A tree is a special case of a graph where nodes are connected only through parent-child relations. A node can only have 0..1 parent and 0..* children. This particular behaviour is implemented by using specific methods and not relying on explicit edges.

    Author:
    Jacques Gignoux - 9 mai 2019
